Convert-LNTextures._TexturesSourcePath: This is the path of your local vanilla minecraft resource pack copy which contains all blocks
Convert-LNTextures.TexturesSourcePath: Path of the vanilla texture block files (../textures/blocks)
Convert-LNTextures._DefaultTemplatePath: The path of the json file which should be used for the conversion
Convert-LNTextures._DefaultTemplateBlockToReplace: The block which should be replaced from the template. Equivalent to -BlockNameToReplace flag
